All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractHtmlFactory<T>
This is an abstract interface for an HTML factory which creates pre-built standard web application pages.
App
The App class is the core class of the application, responsible for managing the web server and handling HTTP requests.
ApplicationServlet
The ApplicationServlet class is a servlet that sets the application title and responds to GET requests with an HTML page
Authentication
The Authentication class handles user authentication.
Authenticator
The Authenticator interface provides a contract for classes that handle user authentication.
BCryptPasswordEncryptionAlgorithm
Implementation of the PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm interface that encrypts passwords using the BCrypt algorithm.
ChatMethod
 
ChatRoom
A chat room that allows users to send and receive messages using a specified chat strategy.
ChatStrategy
An interface that defines the behavior of a chat strategy.
Controller
Abstract class representing a controller in the MVC-pattern for web applications.
CustomServlet
CustomServlet is a class that extends HttpServlet and is used to handle GET and POST requests.
DefaultServlet
The DefaultServlet class is a servlet that serves a simple plain text response.
EntityModel
Class for creating an entity model and adding to a database
EntityModel.Field
The Field class represents a field in an entity model, consisting of a name, data type, and nullability.
EntityModelBuilder
This interface defines a builder for creating an EntityModel.
FactoryAuth
The FactoryAuth class provides a factory method for creating Authenticator and SMSCodeGenerator objects
GroupChat
 
HomeServlet
HomeServlet is a servlet that serves the homepage for a web application.
HtmlFactory
The HtmlFactory class implements the AbstractHtmlFactory interface to provide methods for creating different types of HTML pages.
HTMLFormGenerator
 
HtmlPageBuilder
This class implements the IHtmlBuilder interface and can be used to build a custom HTML page.
HtmlPages
This class contains pre-built HTML pages for a web application.
HtmlParser
HtmlParser is a utility class for parsing HTML pages.
HttpMethodException
 
IHtmlBuilder
This is an interface for building an HTML page.
IHtmlPage
This is an interface for pre-built HTML pages.
IRoute
This is an interface for defining a route in a web application.
Logger
Logger is a utility class for turning off Jetty logging.
LogInAuthentication
The LogInAuthentication class handles user login using authentication and SMS verification.
LoginServlet
The LoginServlet class is a subclass of the AbstractServlet class,representing the login page of a web application.
LogoutServlet
A servlet class that handles the logout functionality of the web application.
Main
 
MyController
 
NoHtmlContentException
 
PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm
 
PrivateChat
A chat strategy for private chats between two users.
RepositoryConnection
An interface which provides methods for connecting and disconnecting a repository.
Route
Route is a class that implements the IRoute interface and represents an HTTP endpoint.
SMSCodeGenerator
The SMSCodeGenerator interface provides a contract for classes that generate and send verification codes via SMS.
SMSVerification
The SMS class generates and sends verification codes via SMS.
SqlConnection
The SqlConnection class implements the RepositoryConnection interface and provides a concrete implementation of a database connection for SQL databases.
SqlQueryBuilder
Class for creating sql queries easily.
User
This is a record class for representing a user in a web application.
User
 
UserController
 
UserDAO
This is an interface for a data access object (DAO) that provides methods for saving, retrieving, and deleting user objects.
UserDatabase
 
UserDb
The UserDb class implements the UserDAO interface and provides methods to save, get and delete user objects from the temporary database.
UserInputValidator
The UserInputValidator class that contains methods for validating usernames and passwords
